original_title: Dragon Tales - Sing and Dance in Dragonland
overview: Favorite musical moments from the popular children's television series Dragon Tales are collected on this special home-video release. Dragon Tales: Sing and Dance in Dragonland features 20 songs from the show, with easy-to-read singalong lyrics appearing onscreen so kids of all ages can join in the musical fun.
title: Dragon Tales - Sing and Dance in Dragonland
